function.name: youtube_download
function.description: Download videos or audio from YouTube URLs. Supports audio-only (for transcription), video, or both. Files saved to docs/video/ for integration with video_transcribe tool.

operation.description: Operation to perform: 'download' downloads media, 'get_info' retrieves metadata only

url.description: YouTube video URL (supports youtube.com/watch?v=, youtu.be/, youtube.com/shorts/, etc.)

media_type.description: Type of media to download: 'audio' (MP3, best for transcription), 'video' (MP4), or 'both' (separate files). Default: 'audio'

quality.description: Video quality (ignored for audio-only). 'best' selects highest available. Default: 'best'

filename.description: Custom filename (without extension). If omitted, uses sanitized video title. Unique suffix (_1, _2, etc.) added if file exists

max_duration.description: Maximum video duration in seconds. Rejects longer videos to avoid excessive downloads. Default: 7200 (2 hours), max: 14400 (4 hours)

timeout.description: Download timeout in seconds. Default: 300 (5 min), min: 5, max: 600 (10 min)
